txt.en: Céolflad, a healer, has vowed to ensure that Ránmald can deliver her child amongst friends and helpers. She has asked that plenty of firewood be collected to get the women ready for digging into their new temporary home.

'Don't ye worry no more, [placeholder]. We were petty before, but there's a child coming, and we're women of Byre Tor. I've delivered plenty of babies; Ránmald is in good hands.

'Well, since we'll be settlin' in for a while until mother and child are fit to walk far, I'll be needing some firewood to get us started.

'See if the other ladies need anything for our stay, and then ye must go and continue yer heroism in the rest of Wildermore, so we can get home again.'
'This'll do nice, [placeholder]. We'll keep Ránmald warm until she's out of danger.\n\n'Now go help the other refugees! If they ran into the Balewood, they'll need it....'
Firewood can be found around clusters of trees in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should collect firewood so that the women can comfortably settle into their new temporary home.
Céolflad is in the refugees' cave in northern Byre Tor.\n\nYou should bring the firewood to Céolflad.
